hero.title: Premium Medical Travel to Guangxi, China
hero.subtitle: Experience world-class healthcare combined with the natural beauty of Guangxi. From traditional Chinese medicine to modern treatments, we provide comprehensive medical travel services.

about.title: About MedTravel China
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for medical travel to Guangxi, China. We bridge the gap between world-class healthcare and international patients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are dedicated to making premium healthcare accessible to international patients by connecting them with top medical facilities in Guangxi, China. Our comprehensive services ensure a seamless medical travel experience from start to finish.

whyGuangxi.title: Why Guangxi?
whyGuangxi.description: Guangxi offers a unique combination of excellent healthcare facilities and stunning natural beauty. The region is home to world-famous Guilin, known for its karst mountains and the Li River, providing an ideal setting for recovery and relaxation.

items.question: How do I start the process?
items.answer: Simply fill out our contact form or give us a call. Our patient coordinator will discuss your needs and guide you through the process.

items.question: Do you provide visa assistance?
items.answer: Yes, we provide invitation letters and documentation to support your visa application for medical travel to China.

items.question: What languages do you support?
items.answer: Our team speaks English, Mandarin, and Cantonese. We also provide interpreter services for other languages upon request.

items.question: Is payment secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use secure payment methods and provide detailed invoices for all services. We also accept international insurance in some cases.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for medical travel to Guangxi, China. We provide comprehensive healthcare services combined with memorable travel experiences.
